l10n_infotext_caaccount1.en: Change/enter the account with which your NREN connects to the Comodo-API. You should have received account information either from TERENA or any other contract partner via which you signed up to Confusa.

l10n_infotext_caaccount2.en: Note: The account password will be encrypted using 256-Bit AES in CFB blockmode before being stored in the DB.

l10n_title_apname.en: The AP-name is used by the remote-CA for identifying the reseller. You should have received this from TERENA.

l10n_err_noaccfound.en: Cannot get NREN-account info. Please add at least one account before changing the account information!

l10n_err_fieldsmissing.en: Cannot add new account when fields are missing!
